content: https //blog clover-usa com/2021/07/20/garden-party-bag/ the garden party bag is the perfect bag for a special event or a lunch with friends it s crocheted with medium size 4 cotton yarn in a pretty dotted design the yarn is crocheted to round bag handles and then the bag is created from the top down the openwork stitches and raised dots give an elegant look to the bag and an easy slip_stitch seam finishes the bottom of the bag the hook used for this project is a clover amour hook in size g/4mm and the yarn used is lion brand 24/7 cotton finished measurements 10 high excluding handles by 10 wide materials lion brand 24/7 cotton medium weight size 4 mercerized cotton yarn 2 skeins lilac or bay leaf size g/4mm clover amour crochet hook round bag handles approx 5 5 inches diameter panda hall 6 pcs wooden purse handles amazon com tapestry needle
